member.name: T:System.ScriptLoader
member.summary: The Script class contains various methods that represent global methods present in the underlying script engine.

member.name: M:System.ScriptLoader.LoadScripts(System.String[])
member.param: The names of scripts that are required and must be loaded.

member.name: M:System.ScriptLoader.LoadScripts(System.String[],System.Action)
member.summary: Loads the specified scripts and invokes the specified callback once they have been loaded.
member.param: The names of scripts that are required and must be loaded.
A callback to be invoked once the scripts have been loaded.

member.name: M:System.ScriptLoader.LoadScripts``1(System.String[],System.Action{``0},``0)
member.summary: Loads the specified scripts and invokes the specified callback once they have been loaded.
member.param: The names of scripts that are required and must be loaded.
A callback to be invoked once the scripts have been loaded.
The object to be passed in into the callback.
member.typeparam: The type of the context object.
